organisation.name: Full legal name of the insurance company
organisation.email: Insurer's customer care email address, if mentioned
organisation.website: Insurer's official website URL, if mentioned

tpaOrganisation.name: Name of the Third Party Administrator (TPA), if any
tpaOrganisation.identifier: TPA ID or IRDAI Licence number, if mentioned

insurancePlan.name: Full commercial name of the health insurance policy/product
alias: Any alternate product name, short name, or marketing name
insurancePlan.typeCode: Use '01' for Hospitalisation Indemnity, '02' for Top-up, '05' for PA
insurancePlan.periodStart: Policy start date in YYYY-MM-DD format, if stated
insurancePlan.periodEnd: Policy end date or expiry date in YYYY-MM-DD format, if stated
coverageArea: Geographic area of validity, e.g. 'India', 'Pan India'
networks: Name of each provider/hospital network listed, e.g. 'HDFC Ergo Network Hospitals'

contacts.purpose: e.g. Claims Helpline, Grievance, Customer Service
contacts.name: Contact person or department name, if mentioned
contacts.email: Email address for this contact, if mentioned

supportingInfoRequirements.categoryCode: 'POI' for Proof of Identity or 'POA' for Proof of Address
supportingInfoRequirements.categoryDisplay: Proof of Identity or Proof of Address
supportingInfoRequirements.documentDisplay: Human-readable document name, e.g. Aadhaar Card

exclusions.categoryCode: 'Excl01' for Pre-Existing Disease or 'Excl02' for Waiting Period
exclusions.statement: Exact exclusion rule text extracted from the document

coverages.typeDisplay: Coverage category name, e.g. Inpatient Care, Day Care, Tele Consultation
coverages.condition: Any specific condition or prerequisite for this coverage, if stated

benefits.typeCode: Provide the exact 9-15 digit SNOMED CT code if possible (e.g. 568291000005106 for Room Rent). If not known, leave empty
benefits.typeDisplay: Specific benefit name, e.g. Room Rent, ICU Charges, Doctor Consultation
benefits.limitUnit: Unit of the limit, e.g. INR, Days, Percentage

specificCosts.categoryCode: Provide exactly the SNOMED CT code for the cost category, e.g. 49122002 for Ambulance
specificCosts.benefitTypeCode: Same as categoryCode or a more specific SNOMED CT code
